scripts.build: npm run flush && webpack --env production && cd src/client && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run flush && webpack --env production && cd src/client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m Deploy && git push heroku master
scripts.dev: npm run flush && concurrently --kill-others "cd src/client && npm start" "webpack"
